text.body:
Hello,
It looks like this is your first time! I am JobTrackAI, an agent that helps keep track of jobs! Forget spreadsheets and other draconian methods. You can rely on me!

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )
